message.content:
1. Open the LibreOffice Calc spreadsheet where you want to paste the copied content.
2. Select the cell where you want to paste the copied content.
3. In that cell, enter the formula: `=REPLACE(A1,"'","")` (without quotes). This formula will remove all single quotes from the content in cell A1.
4. Press "Enter" to apply the formula and remove the single quotes from the selected cell.
5. You can now copy this formula to other cells by selecting a cell with the formula, right-clicking on it, and selecting "Copy." Then go to the cells where you want to paste the new formula and press "Paste" to apply it there.
